member.name: T:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser
member.summary: Parses comma-delimited text files.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input stream.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input stream with the specified encoding.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input stream with the specified encoding and byte order mark detection option.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input stream with the specified encoding and byte order mark detection option, and optionally leaves the stream open.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input file path.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input file path with the specified encoding.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input file path with the specified encoding and byte order mark detection option.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.#ctor(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Constructs a parser from the specified input text reader.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.EndOfData
member.summary: True if there are lines between the current cursor position and the end of the file.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.ReadFields
member.summary: Reads all fields on the current line, returns them as an array of strings, and advances the cursor to the next line containing data.
member.returns: An array of strings that contains field values for the current line, or null if is true.
member.exception: if the parse of the current line failed

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.Close
member.summary: Closes the current object.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.Dispose
member.summary: Closes and disposes the current object.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of the current object.
member.param: true if called from , or false if called from a finalizer

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.ErrorLine
member.summary: The line that caused the most recent .
member.remarks: If no exceptions have been thrown, an empty string is returned. The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.ErrorLineNumber
member.summary: Returns the number of the line that caused the most recent exception.
member.remarks: If no exceptions have been thrown, -1 is returned. The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.CompatibilityMode
member.summary: True if this parser should exactly reproduce the behavior of the Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.Delimiters
member.summary: Defines the delimiters for a text file. Default is a comma.
member.remarks: This is defined as an array of strings for compatibility with Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser, but this parser only supports one single-character delimiter.
member.exception: A delimiter value is set to a newline character, an empty string, or null.
The delimiters are set to an array that does not contain exactly one element with exactly one character.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.SetDelimiter(System.Char)
member.summary: Sets the delimiter character used by this parser. Default is a comma.
member.exception: The delimiter character is set to a newline character.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.SetQuoteCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Sets the quote character used by this parser, and also sets the quote escape character to match if it previously matched. Default is a double quote character.
member.exception: The quote character is set to a newline character.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.SetQuoteEscapeCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Sets the quote escape character used by this parser. Default is the same as the quote character, a double quote character.
member.exception: The quote escape character is set to a newline character.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes
member.summary: Denotes whether fields are enclosed in quotation marks when a CSV file is being parsed. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvTextFieldParser.TrimWhiteSpace
member.summary: Indicates whether leading and trailing white space should be trimmed from field values. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvMalformedLineException
member.summary: An exception that is thrown when the method cannot parse a row using the specified format.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvMalformedLineException.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Constructs an exception with a specified message and a line number.

member.name: M:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvMalformedLineException.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64,System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructs an exception with a specified message, a line number, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.name: P:NotVisualBasic.FileIO.CsvMalformedLineException.LineNumber
member.summary: The line number of the malformed line.
